name: grocers-lists
description: A way for shoppers to manage their shopping lists

scripts.stage: modulus env set METEOR_SETTINGS "$(cat settings-development.json)" -p 'Grocers Lists - Staging' && modulus deploy -p 'Grocers Lists - Staging'
scripts.deploy: modulus env set METEOR_SETTINGS "$(cat settings-production.json)" -p 'Grocers Lists' && modulus deploy -p 'Grocers Lists'
